title: What science reveals about the likes and dislikes of the leaf-cutter bee
text:
Pre-eminent among the minority of garden wildlife that we actually notice are the three Bs: birds, butterflies and bees, and bumblebees (big, loud and abundant) get most of the attention. Solitary bees are quieter, usually smaller and often overlooked, but they’re efficient pollinators. They also have a big advantage for the hands-on wildlife gardener: artificial bumblebee nests very rarely attract any customers, but many solitary bees will use artificial “bee hotels”.
